description: A 31-year-old and 28-year-old are detained on suspicion of affray, police say.
title: Two men arrested after fight in Nottingham city centre
title_page: Two men arrested after fight in Nottingham city centre - BBC News
maintext:
Two men have been arrested following reports of a fight in Nottingham.
Armed officers were called to Lower Parliament Street at about 11:40 GMT on Thursday.
A cordon was put in place on nearby Hockley and a machete was recovered, Nottinghamshire Police said.
A 31-year-old man was arrested on suspicion of affray later the same day, while a 28-year-old man was detained on suspicion of the same offence on Friday, the force added.
